name: Running Out (Brickle Pickle)
description:
---> Description <---

Game made for the "GameDevHQ Community Game-Jam".

This game is a game that only need 2 mins (+ if u lose) it has a great story and a great gameplay... To play you only need arrows.

You can download the game or play in the browse.

---------------------------------------------------------

--->⚠️❗❗⚠️ IMPORTANT ⚠️❗❗⚠️<---

  • There are chances that it won't work on web.
  • There could be errors in the browser version that aren't in the executable version, you jump with up arrow, thanks.
